DOC.brief_summary: This study test whether regular consumption Monosodium Glutamate ( MSG ) immediately prior three major meal ( breakfast , lunch , dinner ) inhibit body weight fat regain follow period moderate , yet clinically significant weight loss .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Monosodium Glutamate Energy Balance Eating Behavior
DOC.detailed_description: The propose study enable u assess long term effect consume MSG body weight regain follow weight loss .
DOC.criteria: Women Age 1945 BMI 2735 Blood pressure < 140/90 Nonsmoking Anemic : hgb < 11.5 mg/dL Sensitivity MSG ( self report ) Pregnant plan get pregnant Taking medication hypertension , depression , weight loss Diabetic Vegetarian MRI Contraindications : internal metal , brace teeth , history metal eye , claustrophobia blindness heavily correct vision fluent English
